Name: maximize_project_budget
Description: Maximize the total budget across all projects

Name: maximize_project_priority
Description: Maximize the sum of priorities for all projects

Name: maximize_feature_priority
Description: Prioritize features with the highest value

Name: maximize_story_points_per_sprint
Description: Maximize the total story points completed in a sprint

Name: minimize_task_effort
Description: Minimize the total effort required for all tasks

Name: minimize_blocker_severity
Description: Minimize the impact of impediments by focusing on high-severity blockers

Name: maximize_team_velocity
Description: Maximize the average story points a team can handle per sprint

Name: maximize_worker_availability
Description: Maximize the overall availability of all workers

Name: maximize_team_satisfaction
Description: Maximize the reported team satisfaction in retrospectives

Name: minimize_epic_effort
Description: Minimize the estimated effort for large-scale epics

Name: maximize_stakeholder_influence
Description: Focus on features relevant to stakeholders with high influence

Name: maximize_skill_level
Description: Maximize the overall skill level of workers assigned to tasks
